name: Shahriar Ahmed
about: Iâ€™m a passionate and results-driven Web Developer with a strong focus on building clean, responsive, and user-friendly websites and web applications. With hands-on experience in modern technologies like React, Next.js, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS, I specialize in creating seamless user experiences and scalable front-end solutions. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive designs. Whether working solo or in a team, I strive to write code that is efficient, maintainable, and performance-optimized.

achievement.title: Optimized Core Web Vitals for Peak Performance
achievement.text: Revamped the front-end architecture of a high-traffic e-commerce platform, focusing on performance optimization. Successfully improved Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) by 40% and reduced Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) to nearly zero, resulting in a 15% increase in user engagement and a 10% boost in conversion rates.

achievement.title: Architected a Scalable Design System
achievement.text: Led the development and implementation of a company-wide design system, establishing a single source of truth for UI components. This initiative reduced development time by 30% and ensured brand consistency across multiple applications, improving collaboration between design and engineering teams.

achievement.title: UI/UX Excellence
achievement.text: Created clean, responsive, and accessible UI designs with a focus on user experience, leading to a 40% increase in user engagement.

achievement.title: Automated Front-End Testing and Deployment
achievement.text: Established a robust CI/CD pipeline for front-end applications, integrating automated testing with Jest and Cypress. This initiative reduced manual testing efforts by 50%, increased deployment frequency by 2x, and significantly minimized bugs in production, leading to a more reliable and stable user experience.

goal: Become a full-stack developer within 1 year.

name: Farzana Khatun
about: Creative UI/UX designer focused on user-centered designs and branding.

achievement.title: Built Interactive Data Visualization Tools
achievement.text: Developed custom, interactive data visualization dashboards using D3.js and Vue.js. These tools enabled clients to better understand complex datasets, providing actionable insights that were previously unavailable. The project resulted in a significant increase in client retention and product stickiness.

achievement.title: Led a Major UI/UX Redesign
achievement.text: Spearheaded the complete redesign of a flagship product's user interface, collaborating closely with product managers and designers. Implemented a modern, responsive design using Vue.js and Tailwind CSS, which led to a 25% increase in user satisfaction scores and a more intuitive user experience.

achievement.title: Enhanced Cross-Browser Compatibility
achievement.text: Resolved over 50 cross-browser compatibility issues, ensuring a consistent user experience for all major browsers. This effort reduced reported bugs by 35% and improved overall application stability.

achievement.title: Mentored Junior Developers
achievement.text: Provided guidance and code review for a team of three junior developers, helping them improve their skills in Vue.js and best practices. This mentorship led to a 20% increase in team productivity and code quality.

goal: Become a Mastermind designer and mentor Sprouts.
